title: Sports Jokes Gift Book
description: Over 100 Hilarious Sports Jokes for All AgesAnyone who enjoys sports and/or has a sense of humor will love this uproarious joke book. Ralph has compiled the best sports jokes of all time and then added his classic illustrations to produce this beloved collection of knee-slappers for sports enthusiasts. Whether you are getting this book for yourself or as a gift for friends and family members, youâ€™ll find a wide assortment of funny puns and humorous riddles about your favorite activities including baseball, basketball, boxing, car racing, fishing, golf, hockey, soccer, tennis, track, volleyball, wrestling and more.The Sports Joke Gift Book was rated very high on BestJokeBooks.com and makes a great present for avid sports fans, favorite coaches, active kids, aspiring teens and fanatical adults. It is a welcome gift for birthdays, holidays, special occasions, get-well greetings, graduations and retirements. Why just buy a greeting card with one joke when you can get this special book with over a hundred jokes and illustrations? Heck, pick up one copy for a friend and another for yourself. You're worth it!!
author: Ralph Lane
